15533121.title: The Interrogation

155331211.content:
Caster was briefed by Ozpin on what his duties will be as a member of Beacons staff and of his job as a sort of tutor for those who are having trouble utilizing their semblances or activating their Aura.
Caster was given time prepare for the next day which would be when the new students would be arriving at Beacon, Caster spent most of the day setting up his office and sleeping quarters. He then walked around the Academy and getting his bearings along with meeting the other staff members such as Glynda Goodwitch the blond haired woman who came with the police during the Dustshop incident, Peter Port teacher of Grim studies class and Bartholomew Oobleck who teaches the History class.
Glynda was also assigned as Casters sort of guide when it came to accessing the more secretive information and of course all that was known about the coming threat including the comatose Maiden being stored deep underground.
Finally the day came, the arrival of the students. Caster was present standing to the left side of the stage, as Ozpin gave his opening speech. Caster noticed Ruby in the crowd, in the same row as her was a young woman with black hair and a black ribbon, it was then he noticed her yellow eyes, a trait of the Cat Faunus. After the speech was over all the students along with their luggage were moved to another room that would serve as a mass bedroom. Caster then followed Glynda and Ozpin back to Ozpin's office, once there Ozpin began planning out the test which would take place in the Emerald Forest. Caster was tasked with scouting out the forest for any extreme dangers, Caste would report that there was some Ursai present as well as a Nevermore, Death stalker, King Taijitu as well as some Beowolves.
155331211.title: Welcome to Beacon

choices: Aid Ruby and the group against the two Grim.
Stand back and watch the the fight progress.
1553312111.content:
Ozpin and Glynda waited outside for the students to arrive at the testing area, once the students arrived and were standing on top of the launch pads Ozpin began his explanation of the test and how it would work. Afterwards the students were launched one by one over the forest and had to rely on their landing strategies to reach the forest floor safely. Once all of the students disappeared under the tops of the trees Caster was given his task.
Caster was to follow the students covertly while receiving live feed from the many cameras monitoring the students movements, and to only interfere if the situation got out of hand. Caster than proceeded to levitate upwards and the float over the treetops and then once over the forest slowly began to descend towards the forest floor. Once Caster reached the ground he began to track down each student and at the same time keeping tabs on the surrounding grim. As Caster was scouting he came upon a young man engaging a King Taijitu, Caster watched carefully as the fight progressed. Eventually the young man defeated the King Taijitu, then out of nowhere a young woman withe bright red hair popped out of a nearby tree hanging by her legs, they both seemed to know each other and immediately started walking together. Caster decided to follow the pair for a while, after a few hours of following the pair they came upon a Ursa at the same time Caster heard a Nevermore fly over head, Caster also noticed that the cameras were focused on a blond haired boy and a young woman with red hair being chased by a Death stalker. During this the young woman with bright red hair had some how mounted the Ursa along with her partner and began to ride it in a a seemingly random direction, Caster quickly followed them until they rode out into a open feild were Caster could see Ruby and and a group of other students including the young black haired Faunus woman, the young man with blonde hair and the red haired woman engaging the Nevermore and the Death stalker which seems to have headed towards the same area as the Nevermore was. The pair that were riding the Ursa also joined in.
It was here that Caster had a choice, aid them or see if they could handle the situation.
1553312111.title: The Emerald Forest

15533121111.content:
Caster decided that this fight was going to be too much for the young students so Caster decided to aid them. Caster quickly ran out of the trees towards the group. He also noticed the abandoned temple in the background, Caster realized that they must have been attacked while getting their pieces.

Caster: I am here to help.

Ruby: Caster what are you doing here?

Caster: I was ordered by Ozpin to keep an eye on the students, now it is time to deal with these grim.

Caster first targets the Death stalker, he holds out his right arm and holds it with his left hand to steady it, four rings with glyphs appear along Caster's right arm with the last glyph ring appearing in front of his hand the rings begin to spin faster and faster until a ball of energy is formed in front of his hand. Caster then fires the the ball of energy in a massive beam which pierces the Death stalkers head and creating a massive hole. The Death stalker falls defeated, Caster tries to stand up but falls to the ground.

Ruby: Caster what is wrong?!

Caster: I was careless I was careless I did not prepare properly to use that technique, that attack took too much out of me.

Ruby: Don't worry we will handle the other one.

Ruby and the group spotted the Nevermore flying towards some ruins and gave chase, as they entered the ruins the the Nevermore caused a portion of the ruins to collapse separating the young blonde haired man, the red haired woman, the bright red haired woman and her partner from the the other people who were with Ruby. Caster managed to stand and quickly ran towards the ruins, he found Ruby and her group engaged with the Nevermore. Caster was impressed with their team work, and was even more impressed with Ruby defeating the Nevermore. Afterwards Ruby and the rest of the students students chose the remaining chess pieces, it was here that Caster found out the order of events the Blond haired woman and the black haired Faununs woman who's names were Yang and Blake had arrived first and had got their pieces, the bright red haired woman who was called Nora and her partner named Lei Ren had arrived a few minutes after riding the Ursa that Caster had seen them mount and ride off on and which caster followed to this very spot. After Nora and Ren chose their pieces, Ruby and Wiess arrived by jumping off the Nevermore, the same Nevermore Caster had seen fly over head when he saw Nora and Ren mount the Ursa. Soon after Ruby and Wiess arrived the young man with blond hair named John and the red haired woman named Pyrrah arrived while being chased by the Death stalker. The events which happened after all of these events is what Caster had come to encounter.
Ruby, John, Pyrrah and Wiess finally got to choose their pieces and soon after all the pieces had been taken, now they were all ready to head back to Beacon.
15533121111.title: Aid Ruby and the group against the two Grim.

info.brief_description: One of the lovely ladies of the series RWBY fall for you.
info.description:
EDIT: Okay, I might use Sasuke as a base here, but I wont be giving him my usual chaos powers here, aside form the sharingan I will nerf him immensely, not turning him into something ourside a usual member of this world.

Okay guys I am trying my hand at this, and let me stress this now, I want you all to try to have fun too, create a character, choose your woman, and try to make a good story. Here are the additional rules. And to all hardcore fans of this franchise, I am doing this for fun, I like the show too, so please don't get all uppity here please.

-The girls are AT LEAST 18 years old in this story ok? as such, sex, foot fetish, and others are allowed, but NO incest, butt stuff, feces, any of that nasty stuff, keep it mild if u do a scene where they make love or something ok?

-after thinking this through, I am goingt o allow Shrinking, but some conditions here. 1: the smallest you can get is to the size of the foot of one of the ladies. 2: No vore. I will allow a kiss, some playful licking, etc. but no being eaten, killed, etc. and I encourage using this to comedy, or having a time where you are in the protection of the chosen woman.

- Since they have a game in this world that has similar elements of Duel Monsters (Yu-Gi-Oh!) to them, I will add that game to the world as well. you don't HAVE to use it, just a little something extra if you want

-Try to create a weapon that is also a gun, like 2 sword combining or something, Bows/Arrows are also acceptable.

-IF you do a team, try to make the first letter of your characters name fit in with the rule that teams sound like a color. But you don't have to do teams, in fact you can make your characters strong enough to be a one man team, but they still need help from the love interest and/or the love interests team. One last thing, if you want to have your person join a certain pre-established team, you don't have to add your letter to it. you can if you want, like say team RWBYS but whatever. just want to make it easier for you

-ABSOLUTELY no one line chapters. I cannot stress this enough. and if you add, please try to add to the story.

-Have some fun with it.
